item.title: Finding subsets with particular sums
item.description: On Friday I came in on the tail end of a conversation explaining the solution to this problem. I think it’s pretty interesting. Given a list of integers L and a target sum S, what’s the best way to find the pair x, y where x and y are both distinct elements of L such that x + y = S? We also want to be able to determine if there is no such pair.
